game.name: Assassin Knight
game.description:
Are you a lover of assassin games? Is eliminating the deadly enemies using different kinds of weapons like knives, rifles or guns your hobby? If yes, Assassin Knight is a brand new arcade challenge you should not miss out. You are going to play the role of a courageous fighter who is lashed with a sharp sword. Your objective is to clear the battleground from all the dangerous enemies that you see on the scary maze that is full of deadly traps.

Choose your character, and then map and get ready to witness the biggest fight of your life! You have to build your lost kingdom again and that could only be possible when you fight like a champion. Try to win as many fights as you can to create your kingdom again successfully in this HTML5 best fighting game! Aim your target enemies wisely to defeat them and send them to their home back!

Your every successful enemy elimination will help you to earn some points or money through which you can upgrade your character and weapons as well. Change your character anytime you want during the gameplay! Be careful and try to keep your character away from your enemies otherwise you will soon be thrown out of the maze! Good luck to clear as many enemies as you can to build a powerful kingdom and become the best assassinator of the virtual world!

game.mobileControlKeys: TAP AND HOLD ON KNIGHT TO SELECT THE DIRECTION BY YELLOW ARROW AND RELESE TO HIT THE MONSTER TO THROW HIM OUT SIDE THE BOUNDRY
game.webControlKeys: PRESS AND HOLD ON KNIGHT TO SELECT THE DIRECTION WITH YELLOW ARROW AND RELESE TO HIT THE MONSTER TO THROW HIM OUTSIDE THE BOUNDRY
